body_html:
Unfortunately, we do not have machines that have avx2 support for all configurations we have.
I can see ourselves upgrading some of the machines soon, however as Apple did not update mac pro's this year, I see no way for us to release avx2 images for mac.
For linux, this might be possible in some near future, but not immediately.

body:
Unfortunately, we do not have machines that have avx2 support for all configurations we have.
I can see ourselves upgrading some of the machines soon, however as Apple did not update mac pro's this year, I see no way for us to release avx2 images for mac.
For linux, this might be possible in some near future, but not immediately.
